document.discussion_title: The emerging new era of general practice
document.topic_text: 10 May, 2016 By Sophie Castle-Clarke How the evolution of general practice is being driven by advancements in technology Subscribe to read the full article With an HSJ subscription you’ll get access to: Latest intelligence on NHS policy and agenda Which healthcare leadership teams are getting it right and why How innovation is driving quality and efficiency
